description: This file is a CMake module script that searches for and configures the 'gstreamer-video-1.0' library, including setting up variables and imported targets for use in the build process.

methods.name: find_package
methods.description: Locates the specified package in the system's package registry.

methods.name: pkg_check_modules
methods.description: Checks for the presence of a package configuration module

methods.name: include
methods.description: Includes and executes another CMake script or module.

methods.name: FIND_PACKAGE_HANDLE_STANDARD_ARGS
methods.description: Macro for handling the standard args for find_package results.

methods.name: mark_as_advanced
methods.description: Marks variables as advanced for CMake cache GUIs.

methods.name: find_library
methods.description: Finds a library and sets the respective variable.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Creates an imported or built library target.

calls: set_target_properties(GStreamerVideo::GStreamerVideo PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LANGUAGES "C" IMPORTED_LOCATION "${GSTREAMER_VIDEO_LIBRARY}" INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GSTREAMER_VIDEO" INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS "${PC_GSTREAMER_VIDEO_CFLAGS_OTHER}" INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PC_GSTREAMER_VIDEO_INCLUDE_DIRS}" INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES "${PC_GSTREAMER_VIDEO_LIBRARIES}")
